stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {-1: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {1.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {5.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({-0.05: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-0.5: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-5.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-1.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-10.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-100.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {})) if usage_decision == 'restrict' else ({0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({-0.5: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-5.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-50.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-10.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-100.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-1000.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {})) if usage_decision == 'permit' else {}

lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {5.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == 0 else {4.95: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05 else {4.5: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5 else {4.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -5 else {0.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -50 else {-5.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -100 else {-45.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 5.0 and cancer_cost == -1000 else {1.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == 0 else {0.95: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05 else {0.5: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5 else {0.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -5 else {-4.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -50 else {-9.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -100 else {-49.0: 1.0} if economic_value == 1.0 and cancer_cost == -1000 else {-1.0: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == 0 else {-1.05: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -0.05 else {-1.5: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -0.5 else {-2.0: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -5 else {-6.0: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -50 else {-11.0: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -100 else {-51.0: 1.0} if economic_value == -1.0 and cancer_cost == -1000 else {}
